name: The Idolm@ster: Shiny Festa - Groovy Tune
summary: The Idolmaster Shiny Festa is a series of three Japanese rhythm video games developed and published by Bandai Namco Games. The games are part of The Idolmaster franchise, and were originally released on October 25, 2012 as Honey Sound, Funky Note , and Groovy Tune for the PlayStation Portable in Japan.

alternative_names.name: The Idolmaster: Shiny Festa - Groovy Tune
